0.cdata!:
Projet de Rehabilitation Agricole et de
            Gestion Durable des Terres au Burundi : plan d'action
            pilote pour le deveeloppement des Batwa

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Pilot Plan of
            Action for Development of Batwa is participation in the
            implementation of high-priorities activities to boost
            socio-economic development in order for Batwa to move out of
            their extreme poverty, taking into account their needs. This
            will be done by financing activities to increase production
            and strengthen the institutional and technical capacity of
            producer organizations, government departments, private
            sector operators and groups involved in rural development.
            This Indigenous Peoples Plan (IPP) reviews the
            country's legal and regulatory legislation regarding
            indigenous populations, and its socioeconomic conditions,
            and, draws the guidelines / safeguards to protect indigenous
            populations in and around the project, who may potentially
            suffer adverse impacts as a result of the project implementation.
